problem_names:
lemma valid_trueI [intro]:
  fixes G::\<Gamma>
  assumes "P ; B \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f G"
  shows "P ; B ; G \<Turnstile> C_true"
translations:
lemma valid_trueI [intro]:
  fixes G::\<Gamma>
  assumes "P ; B \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f G"
  shows "P ; B ; G \<Turnstile> C_true"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (prove)
using this:
   ?a1.0 \<Turnstile> ?a2.0  =
  (\<exists>i c.
      ?a1.0 = i \<and> ?a2.0 = c \<and>  i \<lbrakk> c \<rbrakk> ~ True )
   ?i \<lbrakk> TRUE \<rbrakk> ~ True 

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i.  i \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i.  i \<Turnstile> TRUE 

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i.  i \<Turnstile> TRUE 

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1.  P ; B ; G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE

proof (prove)
using this:
   ?\<Theta> ; ?\<B>  \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f ?\<Gamma>  \<Longrightarrow>
   ?\<Theta> ; ?\<B> ; ?\<Gamma>   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE 
   P ; B  \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f G 

goal (1 subgoal):
 1.  P ; B ; G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE

proof (state)
this:
   P ; B ; G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE 

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>i.  i \<Turnstile> TRUE 
   P ; B ; G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i.  i \<Turnstile> TRUE 
   P ; B ; G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE 

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i.  i \<Turnstile> TRUE 
   P ; B ; G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f TRUE 
  (?P ; ?B ; ?G  \<Turnstile> ?c ) =
  ( ?P ; ?B ; ?G   \<turnstile>\<^sub>w\<^sub>f ?c  \<and>
   (\<forall>i.
        ?P ; ?G \<turnstile> i \<and>  i \<Turnstile> ?G  \<longrightarrow>
        i \<Turnstile> ?c ))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE

proof (state)
this:
  P ; B ; G  \<Turnstile> TRUE 

goal:
No subgoals!
